short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lightweight, minimalist flashcards extension for learning various topics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover a fun, minimalist way to learn with our lightweight Chrome extension. Designed to be user-friendly and basic, it offers interactive flashcards on a variety of topics, ideal for quick learning sessions. Whether you're brushing up on general knowledge or exploring new subjects, this extension makes education both engaging and accessible. Perfect for learners of all ages who appreciate simplicity and efficiency in their educational tools.
